UniprotID	Q9NYR8
Accession	Q9NYR8;Q9H838
EntryName	RDH8_HUMAN
ProteinName	Retinol dehydrogenase 8 (EC 1.1.1.300) (Photoreceptor outer segment all-trans retinol dehydrogenase) (Short chain dehydrogenase/reductase family 28C member 2)
GeneName	RDH8 PRRDH SDR28C2
Length	311
Function	Retinol dehydrogenase with a clear preference for NADP. Converts all-trans-retinal to all-trans-retinol. May play a role in the regeneration of visual pigment at high light intensity (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Membrane
